channel.title: BUscience
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUscience, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Clearing brain plaques isn’t enough to heal Alzheimer’s

item.title: Archaeologists may have finally solved Peru’s strange “Band of Holes” mystery

item.title: Hidden weakness makes prostate cancer self-destruct
item.description: Researchers have discovered that prostate cancer depends on two key enzymes, PDIA1 and PDIA5, to survive and resist therapy. When blocked, these enzym...

item.title: New research finds no clear link between acetaminophen (Tylenol) and autism
item.description: A sweeping review of existing studies finds no solid evidence that using acetaminophen (Tylenol) during pregnancy increases the risk of autism or ADHD...

item.title: Scientists find brain chemical tied to trauma and depression
